price: 31. Ainsi avons-Nous désigné à chaque Prophète un ennemi parmi les criminels. Que ton Seigneur suffise comme guide et comme soutien !
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
